item.title: Instructions to remind you how you made this fiirst post in Hugo in the first place, which includes Sublime, Terminal, Hugo, Markdown
item.description: Open Terminal on your Mac. Navigate to the root directory of your Hugo site using the cd command. Run the following command to start the Hugo local server with the --watch flag: Your Hugo server should now be running and accessible at http://localhost:1313/ in your web browser. To stop the server, press Control + C in your Terminal window. Open up Sublime. Use Terminal to open up the current directory open .
